headline: WTW Radar integrates with Databricks to simplify and fast-track data sharing
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW) today announced the launch of the Radar Connector for Databricks, a significant addition to WTWâ€™s market-leading end-to-end insurance analytics and pricing platform. The new integration allows Radar users to connect securely with Databricks - eliminating manual data movement, accelerating analysis and improving governance.
